column3: [' (StepDescription: Add-1 heaped tbsp flour to a blender)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1/2 tsp baking powder to a blender)']
[' (StepDescription: Melt-Melt a small knob of butter in a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat)']
[' (StepDescription: Pour-Pour three little puddles straight from the blender into the frying pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook for 1 min or until the tops start to bubble)']
[' (StepDescription: Serve-Serve the pancakes with chopped strawberries)']
